## Installation

You can install the development version of **northstar** from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/northstar")
```

## Example: Payment Amount Calculation

```{r example, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
rvu <- rvu(hcpcs = "11646") |> 
  select(hcpcs, 
         description,
         wrvu, 
         prvu_nf, 
         prvu_f, 
         mrvu, 
         cf)

rvu |> glimpse()
```

```{r}
gp <- gpci(
  state    = "GA",
  locality = "99",
  mac      = "10212")

gp |> glimpse()
```

```{r}
calc_amounts(wrvu     = rvu$wrvu,
             prvu_nf  = rvu$prvu_nf,
             prvu_f   = rvu$prvu_f,
             mrvu     = rvu$mrvu,
             cf       = rvu$cf,
             wgpci    = gp$wgpci,
             pgpci    = gp$pgpci,
             mgpci    = gp$mgpci)
```

```{r}
payment(hcpcs    = "11646", 
        mac      = "10212",
        locality = "99") |> 
  select(hcpcs,
         mac,
         locality,
         fee_nf,
         fee_f) |> 
  glimpse()
```
